mapper.update: update t_recharge_user set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, completed_time = #{completedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, client = #{client,jdbcType=TINYINT}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, user_id, order_no, amount, status, completed_time, client, summary from t_recharge_user
